attributes.action: Revoke the inhuman decision to deport Ama Sumani
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: From a christian perspective that values human life the British Goverments decision to Deport a terminally ill woman to a country which offers her little hope of treatment; is both- unbalanced with other immigration decisions -and inhuman in the extreme.The PRIME MINISTER talks often of his Christian values- will he please look into this case.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
